CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Monitor new transactions as they happen on the Ethereum blockchain
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what industry leaders have to say about our Ethereum transaction analysis platform.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Unparalleled insights into new Ethereum transactions. This tool has been invaluable for monitoring activity and spotting trends.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The live data feed and customizable alerts allow us to stay ahead of the curve in the rapidly evolving Ethereum ecosystem.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This platform's user-friendly interface and robust analytics capabilities have streamlined our Ethereum transaction monitoring process.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Get real-time insights into new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain. Monitor for specific wallet addresses, contract deployments, and more.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Apply custom filters to hone in on the transactions most relevant to your needs. Search by value, gas price, contract type, and other parameters.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Access comprehensive data on each new transaction, including the sender, receiver, value transferred, gas used, and input data.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Set up webhooks to receive instant notifications when transactions matching your filters occur, enabling real-time monitoring and analysis.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Maintain a full history of all analyzed transactions for future reference, auditing, and deeper investigation when needed.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Seamlessly integrate our Ethereum transaction analysis capabilities into your existing applications and workflows via our robust API.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Ethereum transaction analytics involves monitoring and analyzing data from the Ethereum blockchain to gain insights into transaction activity, address behavior, smart contract interactions, and more.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: It helps users understand Ethereum usage patterns, detect anomalies or suspicious behavior, track token transfers, audit smart contracts, and make informed decisions based on on-chain data.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: The app analyzes data like transaction hashes, block details, sender/receiver addresses, transaction values, gas usage, internal message calls, event logs from smart contracts, and token transfer activity.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Simply connect the app to an Ethereum node or archival data source. The intuitive interface lets you search, filter, and visualize transaction data in real-time or across historical timeframes.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about analyzing new Ethereum transactions with our app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to analyze new Ethereum transactions in real-time. You can view transaction details, track transfers of ERC-20 tokens, and monitor smart contract interactions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the app get transaction data?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We connect directly to Ethereum nodes to stream new transactions as they are added to the blockchain. This ensures you get the latest data without delay.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I see internal transactions too?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, our app parses the complete trace of each transaction to surface any internal transfers between smart contracts or wallet addresses.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We support tracking transfers for all major ERC-20 tokens as well as ether (ETH) itself. Contact us to request additional token support.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Sign up for a free trial on our website. The onboarding process will guide you through connecting an Ethereum node and configuring transaction alerts.

PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Stay informed about transactions that matter most. Customize alerts based on specific criteria like sender, receiver, amount, and more.
